name: Maul's Double-Bladed Lightsaber
Lore: 'Maul''s double-blader lightsaber was actually two lightsabers fused into one. Only after years of training could Maul finally wield this powerful weapon, which hasn''t been used in ages.',
Text: 'Deploy on Maul. Adds 1 to Maul''s lightsaber combat total. May lose 1 Force to add 2 to Force drain where present. Twice per battle, may target a character. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total > defense value. May not be stolen.',
